backend/main.mo: Defines actor with user profiles, accounts, payments, transactions, OTP data, and related types and maps for the backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with linked files, components, tests, and confidence metadata for project auditing.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of many frontend source files for reference or build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base file defining OKLCH design tokens for light and dark themes and global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point loading the web app root and manifest with Shanju branding metadata.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest configured for the Shanju Admin Panel with start_url /admin, icons, and an admin shortcut.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing caching, SPA navigation support, and app shell fallback for offline handling.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the TanStack router, page routes, theme provider, service worker hook, and root application structure.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPayme: Admin payments table fetching all payments and displaying them with status, amounts, and payer/payee info.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminUserL: Searches for a user by principal ID and displays profile and account details with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/admin/AndroidIns: Shows Android PWA installation status and instructions with an option to trigger installation.
Displays authenticated user info with a dropdown for account, admin panel access, and sign‑out.
frontend/src/components/brand/ShanjuLogo: Renders the Shanju logo image with a fallback text logo on load error.
frontend/src/components/integrations/Con: Form to create a new connector by entering platform, name, API key, and secret, with validation and submission.
Lists existing connectors with platform labels and supports deleting a selected connector.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Top navigation header showing the logo and authentication status.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with header, auth‑protected navigation, routed content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/payments/CreditC: Implements a credit card payment form with input validation, formatting, and simulated processing before calling success.
frontend/src/components/payments/Payment: Displays full payment details, role info, and allows status updates, link copying, and opening pending payment links.
Form for creating a new payment request with validation and submission via createPayment hook.
UI for selecting between card or PayPal payment methods.
Lists payments with filters, roles, statuses, and navigation to individual payment details.
Renders a badge showing a payment’s status with corresponding variant styles.
frontend/src/components/payments/PayPalB: Provides a PayPal payment button that simulates redirect and completion before triggering success.
frontend/src/components/payments/SimpleC: Simple text‑based CAPTCHA component that generates codes and verifies user input.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal component that collects a user's name and saves their profile using a mutation with basic validation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/wallet/AddMoneyF: Form for initiating add‑money requests supporting card and bank methods, performing validation, and triggering OTP verification workflow.
frontend/src/components/wallet/AddMoneyO: Dialog for entering and verifying a 6‑digit OTP for add‑money transactions, with resend support and error handling.
frontend/src/components/wallet/CashOutFo: Form for submitting cash‑out requests with validation, provider selection, and conversion of amounts to smallest units.
frontend/src/components/wallet/SendMoney: Form that sends money to another user via phone number with validation, currency handling, and mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/wallet/WalletBal: Card that fetches and displays the user's wallet balances across currencies, showing skeletons during loading.
frontend/src/components/wallet/WalletHis: Renders a wallet transaction history table with icons, labels, status badges, and sorting, using data from useGetCallerTransactionHistory.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Provides a hook to check if the current caller is an admin using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminPanel.ts: Exposes admin-focused queries for listing payments, users, and fetching detailed user account data.
frontend/src/hooks/useConnectors.ts: Provides CRUD hooks for managing platform connectors through the backend actor with react-query caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentPrincipal.t: Returns the authenticated user's Principal or null if unauthenticated or anonymous.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, identity persistence, and exposing identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/usePayments.ts: Hooks for listing, retrieving, creating, and updating payments for the authenticated user.
frontend/src/hooks/usePersonalAccount.ts: Provides hooks to fetch and save the caller’s personal account along with helpers to normalize account data.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstallPrompt.t: Manages PWA install prompt events and exposes installability and installation state.
frontend/src/hooks/useServiceWorker.ts: Registers the service worker on mount and logs success or failure.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Hooks for loading and updating the caller’s user profile via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useWallet.ts: Provides React Query hooks for wallet balance, transaction history, and internal transfers with toast-based error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes with global base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Renders the admin panel with access control and tabs for payments, user lookup, and install guides.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePaymentPage.tsx: Displays a simple page containing the payment creation form.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows payment stats, account prompts, and a table of payments after loading personal account data.
frontend/src/pages/IntegrationsPage.tsx: Provides UI for adding and managing e‑commerce platform integrations.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: 404 page that redirects users back to dashboard or sign‑in depending on authentication.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentDetailsPage.ts: Loads a payment by index from the list and displays detailed information or fallback messages.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentHistoryPage.ts: Shows a full table of the user's payment history.
frontend/src/pages/PersonalAccountPage.t: Manages personal account creation and editing with validation, tabs, and wallet tools.
frontend/src/pages/PublicPaymentPage.tsx: Renders the public payment page with loading, invalid, completed, and pending payment states, allowing users to select a method and complete a payment.
frontend/src/pages/SignInPage.tsx: Displays the Internet Identity sign‑in flow and redirects authenticated users to the dashboard, optionally showing a profile setup modal.
frontend/src/utils/formatCurrency.ts: Formats bigint currency amounts into localized strings using Intl.NumberFormat with a fallback formatter.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash‑based routing values.
frontend/src/utils/walletCurrency.ts: Converts backend currency variants to codes/labels and handles formatting and parsing of wallet amounts across fiat and crypto types.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animated UI.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s PWA‑focused goals, features, and requirements for making the admin panel installable and app‑like on mobile.
